title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 1202 - Roadway Regulations
content:

State Regulations
§ 1202.1 - Speed limits
§ 1202.2 - Distance between moving vehicles
§ 1202.3 - Stopping, standing or parking

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 1202

Statutory authority: N.Y. Laws 1921, ch. 154, art. VI and
N.J. Laws 1921, ch. 151, consented to by Congress 42 U.S. Stat. 174 [1921]; N.Y. Laws 1922, ch. 43 and N.J. Laws 1922, ch. 9, consented to by Congress 42
U.S. Stat. 822 [1922]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
